mapper.select: SELECT c.*, COUNT(DISTINCT crt.cart_seq) AS cart_count, COUNT(DISTINCT wl.wish_seq) AS wishlist_count FROM customer c LEFT JOIN cart crt ON c.cust_seq = crt.cust_seq LEFT JOIN wishlist wl ON c.cust_seq = wl.cust_seq WHERE c.cust_id = #{cust_id} AND c.cust_status = TRUE GROUP BY c.cust_seq, c.cust_id, c.cust_name, c.cust_phone, c.cust_email, c.cust_grade
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER ( cust_seq, cust_id, cust_pw, cust_phone, cust_email, cust_name, cust_status ) VALUES ( nextval('customer_seq'), #{cust_id}, #{cust_pw}, #{cust_phone}, #{cust_email}, #{cust_name}, 'true' )
